flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: If it loses anfang, a new onengrows back in itsfplace. There arenalways 48 fangsnlining its mouth.
It opens its hugenjaws wide whennattacking. If itfloses any fangsnwhile biting, theyngrow back in.
The tips of itsnfangs are slantednbackward. Oncefthose fangs clampndown, the prey hasnno hope of escape.

Once CROCONAW has clamped its jaws onnits foe, it will absolutely not let go.nBecause the tips of its fangs arefforked back like barbed fishhooks, theynbecome impossible to remove when nthey have sunk in.

Once CROCONAW has clamped its jaws onnits foe, it will absolutely not let go.nBecause the tips of its fangs arefforked back like barbed fishhooks, theynbecome impossible to remove when nthey have sunk in.
Once its jaws clamp down on its foe, it willnabsolutely not let go. Because the tips ofnits fangs are forked back like fishhooks,nthey become irremovably embedded.
It opens its huge jaws wide whennattacking. If it loses any fangs whilenbiting, they grow back in.
If it loses a fang, a new one grows backnin its place. There are always 48 fangsnlining its mouth.
Once it bites down, it won’t let gonuntil it loses its fangs. New fangsnquickly grow into place.

If it loses a fang, a new onengrows back in its place. There arenalways 48 fangs lining its mouth.
It opens its huge jaws wide whennattacking. If it loses any fangsnwhile biting, they grow back in.
Quand il mord, il ne lâche pas prisenavant que ses crocs se brisent.nIls repoussent par la suite.
Once it bites down, it won’t let gonuntil it loses its fangs. New fangsnquickly grow into place.

Once it bites down, it won’t let gonuntil it loses its fangs. New fangsnquickly grow into place.

Once it bites down, it won’t let gonuntil it loses its fangs. New fangsnquickly grow into place.
キバは　ぬけても　つぎから　つぎにnはえてくる。いつも　くちのなかにはn４８ぽんの　キバが　そろっている。
이빨이 빠져도 계속해서n자란다. 항상 입안에는n48개의 이빨이 나 있다.
Quand il perd un croc, il en repousse un autre.nSa bouche est en permanence composée de 48ndents.
Verliert es einen seiner Zähne, wächst ein neuernnach. Es hat immer 48 Zähne in seinem Kiefer.
Si pierde un colmillo, le crecerá otro en su lugar.nSiempre tiene 48 colmillos en su boca.
Se perde un dente gliene ricresce un altro. La suanbocca contiene sempre 48 denti.
If it loses a fang, a new one grows back in itsnplace. There are always 48 fangs lining its mouth.
キバは　抜けても　次から　次にn生えてくる。いつも　口の中にはn４８本の　キバが　そろっている。
いちど　かみつくと　キバがnぬけるまで　ぜったいに　はなさない。nぬけた　キバは　すぐに　はえてくる。
한번 물면 이빨이n빠질 때까지 절대 놓지 않는다.n빠진 이빨은 바로 자라난다.
Quand il mord, il ne lâche pas prise avant quenses crocs se brisent. Ils repoussent par la suite.
Hat es einmal zugebissen, lässt es erst los, wenn esnseine Zähne verliert, die schnell nachwachsen.
Cuando muerde algo, no lo suelta hasta que pierdensus colmillos. Estos se regeneran rápidamente.
Quando azzanna il nemico, non molla la presa finchénnon gli cadono le zanne, che però ricrescono subito.
Once it bites down, it won’t let go until it loses itsnfangs. New fangs quickly grow into place.
一度　かみつくと　キバがn抜けるまで　絶対に　離さない。n抜けた　キバは　すぐに　生えてくる。
いちど　かみついたら　ぜったいに　はなさない。nキバの　さきが　つりばり　みたいに　そりかえってnいるので　いちど　ささると　ぬけなく　なるのだ。
한 번 물고 늘어지면 절대로 놓지 않는다.n이빨 끝이 낚싯바늘처럼 휘어져n있어서 한 번 들어가면 빠지지 않는다.
Une fois que Crocrodil a refermé sa mâchoire sur son ennemi,nil est impossible de le faire lâcher prise. Ses crocs sontnrecourbés comme des hameçons et ne peuvent pas êtrenretirés une fois enfoncés.

Wenn Tyracroc einen Feind mit seinen Kiefern eingeklemmtnhat, lässt es ihn nicht mehr los. Da seine Zahnspitzen wienAngelhaken gebogen sind, kann man sie nicht mehr entfernen,nwenn sie sich verfangen haben.
Una vez que Croconaw le ha clavado los colmillos a su presa,nes imposible que escape porque los tiene hacia adentro comonsi fueran anzuelos. Cuando Croconaw hinca los dientes, nonhay escapatoria.
Una volta azzannato il nemico, Croconaw non molla la presanfacilmente. Le zanne a punta ricurva all’indietro, a mo’ dinamo da pesca, rendono impossibile estrarle quando sononconficcate in profondità.

Once Croconaw has clamped its jaws on its foe, it willnabsolutely not let go. Because the tips of its fangs are forkednback like barbed fishhooks, they become impossible to removenwhen they have sunk in.
一度　かみついたら　絶対に　離さない。nキバの　先が　釣り針　みたいに　反り返ってnいるので　一度　刺さると　抜けなく　なるのだ。
いちど　かみついたら　ぜったいに　はなさない。nキバの　さきが　つりばり　みたいに　そりかえってnいるので　いちど　ささると　ぬけなく　なるのだ。

Una vez que Croconaw le ha clavado los colmillos a su presa,nes imposible que escape porque los tiene hacia adentro comonsi fueran anzuelos. Cuando Croconaw hinca los dientes, nonhay escapatoria.
Una volta azzannato il nemico, Croconaw non molla la presanfacilmente. Le zanne a punta ricurva all’indietro, a mo’ dinamo da pesca, rendono impossibile estrarle quando sononconficcate in profondità.

Once Croconaw has clamped its jaws on its foe, it willnabsolutely not let go. Because the tips of its fangs arenforked back like barbed fishhooks, they become impossiblento remove when they have sunk in.
一度　かみついたら　絶対に　離さない。nキバの　先が　釣り針　みたいに　反り返ってnいるので　一度　刺さると　抜けなく　なるのだ。
